member.name: IDXGIFactory4.EnumAdapterByLuid
member.summary: Outputs the for the specified LUID.
member.param: A unique value that identifies the adapter. See LUID for a definition of the structure.LUID is defined in dxgi.h.
The globally unique identifier (GUID) of the object referenced by the ppvAdapter parameter.
The address of an interface pointer to the adapter. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; an error code otherwise. For a list of error codes, see DXGI_ERROR. See also Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: IDXGIFactory4.EnumWarpAdapter
member.summary: Provides an adapter which can be provided to D3D12CreateDevice to use the WARP renderer.
member.param: The globally unique identifier (GUID) of the object referenced by the ppvAdapter parameter.
The address of an interface pointer to the adapter. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; an error code otherwise. For a list of error codes, see DXGI_ERROR. See also Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: IDXGIFactory4
member.summary: Enables creating Microsoft DirectX Graphics Infrastructure (DXGI) objects.
